snippet.title: Altero - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Altero is a beautiful 2D puzzle-platformer game about death and redemption. In this grim environment, you control Adi, a cursed voodoo doll who is lost in the sorrow forest and need to remember his past and find his peace by rescuing the lost souls.

For more information:
http://www.altero-game.com
